output.sentences: After many months of planning, we finally made it to our Girl's Getaway trip destination on the Showboat cruise.
Upon setting sail it seemed so surreal to finally leave our city behind to embark on a journey of fun.
I can finally stop to smell the flowers.
After arriving at our port of call,  I couldn't wait to take in the scenery of this beautiful sandy beach.
But taking in the scenery just wasn't enough. I also wanted to play in the sand too.
